entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 08:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -25.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.8°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
